downloadCard.databaseDisclaimer: Note: any data within the "Tools" page, e.g. Resin amount/timer, are not part of the downloaded database.

goUpload.title: Genshin Optimizer format
goUpload.migrate: Database will be migrated to a newer version. Please consider re-downloading the database after import.
goUpload.deleteDatabasePrompt: Are you sure you want to replace your database? All existing characters and artifacts will be deleted.

monaUpload.title: mona-uranai format
monaUpload.deleteExistingExplanation:
If you're doing a complete import, any artifacts not found in this import will be deleted.(foddered)
Upgraded artifacts will not be deleted, but updated accordingly.
monaUpload.deleteExistingPrompt: Are you sure you want to delete all artifacts not found in the current import? (Upgraded artifacts will not be affected.)
